name: How much do you know about While You Were Sleeping? | Quiz

questions.text: What was the number of Peter's apartment?
questions.explanation:
57G.

	Peter's apartment number was said several times during the scene with Jack, Lucy and the doorman.

questions.text: What breakfast food is also the last name of Peter's girlfriend?
questions.explanation:
Bacon.

	Peter's girlfriend (who was married) was named Ashley Bartlett Bacon. Ashley was played by Ally Walker.

questions.text: What was Joe Jr. trying on in Lucy's closet when she opened the door to get him out?
questions.explanation:
shoes.

	He claimed he slipped and his foot accidentally went into them.

questions.text: What animals did Peter save as a child?
questions.explanation:
squirrels.

	Peter: 'They never call. They never write.' Peter told Jack later in the hospital that he knocked them out of the tree so he could save them.

questions.text: What kind of tree did Lucy say she wished she had gotten as a Christmas tree?
questions.explanation:
Blue Spruce.

	She told her cat this as she pulled the tree up the side of the apartment building. Lucy ended up slipping on the rope and the tree went through her landlord's apartment window.

False.

	Jack's sister, Mary, overheard from her friend that Lucy was pregnant so he confronted her at a New Year's Eve party. Lucy told him she wasn't.

questions.text: What country did Lucy always want to travel to?
questions.explanation:
Italy.

	Lucy told Jack she always wanted to go to Florence, Italy and she had her passport all ready. Jack took her to Florence for their honeymoon.

questions.text: Jack proposed to Lucy at the hospital chapel?
questions.explanation:
No.

	Jack proposed to Lucy at the train booth with his family watching. This was my absolute favorite part of this movie.

questions.text: Jack gave Lucy a reason not to marry Peter?
When did Lucy tell Peter she fell in love with Jack?
questions.explanation:
While you were sleeping.

	Lucy: 'Peter once asked me when it was I fell in love with Jack and I told him. It was while you were sleeping.'
